snippet.title: Arcade Game: Ixion (Prototype) (1983 Sega)
snippet.description:
A shooting game where you collect the letters to spell the word IXION to reach the Kailo Round. Shoot enemies and avoid being shot to yourself.

Sadly this game was finished but never released for unknown reasons. The Atari 2600 version was developed. 

Note: Used Invincibility cheat after down to last life. The game seems to be endless.
